description: This file defines a Zustand store named 'useHistory' that manages a stack of history entries with undo and redo capabilities, including methods to push new entries, undo, redo, and check availability of undo/redo actions.

methods.name: push
methods.description: Adds a new history entry with a label and timestamp, updating the stack and current index.

methods.name: undo
methods.description: Moves the current index backward by one, enabling undo functionality.

methods.name: redo
methods.description: Moves the current index forward by one, enabling redo functionality.

methods.name: canUndo
methods.description: Returns whether undo operation is possible based on current index.

methods.name: canRedo
methods.description: Returns whether redo operation is possible based on current index.
